content:
Craft an item of type: bone_meal
inventory=[{"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 62, "index": 10}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 47, "index": 30}, {"type": "activator_rail", "quantity": 53, "index": 31}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 22, "index": 34}, {"type": "music_disc_chirp", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 37}]
thought: The only way to craft a bone meal is to use the bone in slot 21. Therefore, I will move the bone into slot 1 of the crafting table.
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: bone_meal
inventory=[{"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 62, "index": 10}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 47, "index": 30}, {"type": "activator_rail", "quantity": 53, "index": 31}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 22, "index": 34}, {"type": "music_disc_chirp", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 37}]
thought: I have crafted the bone meal, and now I need to move it out of the crafting table. I will move the bone meal to slot 12 since it is the first available empty slot.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 3
